Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action  
    CounterPowerUpAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    EndBranchAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    ExtendableAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    FireModalityAction
    Class used to create the actions that represent the effects of the various weapons present in the game
    FunctionalAction  
    GrabAction
    This class represents a specific case of extendable action.
    InTurnPowerUpAction
    This class is a specific case of a power up action class.
    MoveAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    PowerUpAction
    This class is a specific case of a shoot action class.
    ReloadAction
    This class is a specific case of an action class.
    RollBackAction  
    ShootAction
    This class is used to represent a particular case of actions, therefore it extends Action and provides all the info necessary to define the targets and effects of a player shooting.
    WeaponSelectionAction
    This class is a specific case of an extendable action class.
